plot: Nine people are tricked and forced by a evil organisation called The Neo-Black Ghosts into becoming cyborgs. But they refuse to become the neo-black ghosts killing machines, and guided by Dr. Gilmore the cyborgs escape. They team up in order to fight the neo-black ghosts and unjustice where ever it shows it's face.
opening_theme: "Taga Tame ni (誰がために)" by Ken Narita and Koorogi '73
ending_theme: "Itsu no Hi ka (いつの日か)" by Koorogi '73
insert_song: "Orphée aux enfers - Menuet et Galop" by Jacques Offenbach (ep 36)
"Sasurai no Thema" (漂泊のテーマ) by Jō Sasaki
